title: Client and penalties
body:
I've been frequently having penalties because I couldn't ban fast enough e.e It's due to the fact that my client lags so much during the ban selection that I often miss the chance to ban and I'm set with 30 minute penalties @@ I feel as if league has been promoting gaming computers and laptops and I just can't afford that. Is there any way to prolong the time selection or at least decrease the penalty time? :/ I've lowered the in game graphics to the lowest, I'm just having problems with this new client that I have never had a problem with before .-. And what is with this 30 minute penalty to begin with though? It's too much even though it was just something simple. I understand leaving halfway through champ selection and dodging, but I wasn't even trying to do that. x__x 
I had to randomly choose a champion because I can't see who I'm banning and then next thing I know my time's up. x.x 
It's really frustrating because I can't even play as much as I want to anymore.

replies.body:
We've certainly seen some performance issues with the Beta Client on lower-spec machines. I'd actually recommend using the *Legacy Client* until we've made some more headway in optimizing the new client for lower-end hardware. You can access the Legacy at any time by using the button at login, as shown below:

https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/article_attachments/215576628/Launch-Legacy-Client.jpg

Let me know if you have any questions.
